input.sentences: a great big statue in the middle of the street .
the same statue with pretty lights on it .
a beautiful ferris wheel with lights on it .
the iffel tower with a light on the top of it .
a beautiful way to end a trip .
output.sentences: As we approuched the tower we began to wonder what it will be once we get to the top.
The lights began to intesifity as we got closer, and made our way up to the top.
In front of us was beautiful, the way the light from the wheel reflected off the water.
Then to our right the tower shined and shimmered in the distnace, like a becon calling us there next.
As we looked around us we realaized we were imersed in a beauty that we would never see again.
